title: B2B Lead Generation Pro
description: Scrapes 5,000+ business leads in just 1 minute across 5–50 km radius. Collects verified emails, phone numbers, addresses, websites, ratings, and categories to streamline sales and marketing outreach.

title: Hardware Management (MoleHardware)
description: Scalable international Canadian e-commerce system with multi-role and seamless content management. Integrated 3rd-party API with 230K+ products without pagination and optimized response from 5 minutes to 5 milliseconds.

title: Meal Management System
description: Advanced meal subscription and delivery system with multi-role management. Built real-time delivery tracking and multi-role management with WebSockets and Celery scheduling.

title: Job Hunter – Smart Job Scraping Platform
description: Automatically scrapes and filters online job posts based on user preferences. Collects job posts from multiple sites and filters them by skills, location, job type, and platform.

title: Agency Website (NARXU)
description: International agency website delivering a modern, fast, secure, and fully API-driven digital experience with a polished UI.

title: Learning Management System
description: A Learning Management System (LMS) is a web application that allows educators to create and manage online courses. It provides a platform for teachers to design, deliver, and assess courses, while students can access and engage with the content.
